DataElement.preferredName: Person Survey Receive Method Preference Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for questions related to a person's preferred means of receiving a document used in data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._To take, accept, or get something offered._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal._The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

Property.preferredDefinition: A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.:To take, accept, or get something offered.:A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

Concepts.definition: A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A country in North America, between Canada and Mexico, bordering both the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Pacific Ocean.: A physical location used by a person or organization for the purpose of receiving postal mail deliveries.

Concepts.definition: A country in North America, between Canada and Mexico, bordering both the North Atlantic Ocean and the North Pacific Ocean.
A physical location used by a person or organization for the purpose of receiving postal mail deliveries.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: World WIde Web; a computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol.

Concepts.definition: A computer network consisting of a collection of internet sites that offer text and graphics and sound and animation resources through the hypertext transfer protocol.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire or measure that is printed on a paper medium and filled out with a writing device.

Concepts.definition: A questionnaire or measure that is printed on a paper medium and filled out with a writing device.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act or process of rendering from one language into another._The desired information is not available._Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: The act or process of rendering from one language into another.
The desired information is not available.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
